Title: The Blackwater Lightship

reviewText: I like this movie it really sheds a light on the issues we as woman can have with each other as mothers and daughters
Title: The Blackwater Lightship

reviewText: This movie is a wonderful adaptation of a great book. Angela Lansbury is fantastic in the role of the grandmother.
Title: The Blackwater Lightship

reviewText: This movie focuses on the a family of broken relationships, specifically the grandmother, mother and daughter.  The son is terminally ill and wants to use his final days to bring them all together again.  The actresses are fantastic, they become their roles.  Characters are well-plumbed and interesting to watch develop.  One of Hallmark's best.
Title: The Blackwater Lightship

reviewText: the film is definitely a little gem! I've bought it for illustration because I have the book in my literature course and I'm glad I did. Of course you need a quiet hour and no disturbance to catch the magic and the deeper truth of it. Just as one cannot read any book at any time, it is the same with films. You have to be in the right mood for such a film. Have you cought the right moment - it makes you think about your own life and family matters. Great camera work and generally marvellous acting and a really, really great Angela Lansbury!
Title: The Blackwater Lightship
